data_table.description: MESA Sleep Ancillary Study Dataset from Exam 5

variable.name: sidno
variable.description: SHARE ID NUMBER

variable.name: stdypdy5c
variable.description: PSG QS: DAYS FROM EXAM 5 TO STUDY DATE

variable.name: avhrbp35
variable.description: AVG. AASM RECOMMENDED HYPOPNEA LENGTH (REM, BACK, 3% DESAT) (SECONDS)

variable.name: avhrop35
variable.description: AVG. AASM RECOMMENDED HYPOPNEA LENGTH (REM, OTHER, 3% DESAT) (SECONDS)

variable.name: avhnbp35
variable.description: AVG. AASM RECOMMENDED HYPOPNEA LENGTH (NREM, BACK, 3% DESAT) (SECONDS)

variable.name: avhnop35
variable.description: AVG. AASM RECOMMENDED HYPOPNEA LENGTH (NREM, OTHER, 3% DESAT) (SECONDS)

variable.name: avdrbp35
variable.description: AVG. DESAT (REM, BACK, 3% DESAT)

variable.name: avdnbp35
variable.description: AVG. DESAT (NREM, BACK, 3% DESAT)

variable.name: avdnop35
variable.description: AVG. DESAT (NREM, OTHER, 3% DESAT)

variable.name: avdrop35
variable.description: AVG. DESAT (REM, OTHER, 3% DESAT)

variable.name: havgdur5
variable.description: AVG. AASM RECOMMENDED HYPOPNEA LENGTH (SECONDS)

variable.name: longhyp5
variable.description: LONGEST AASM RECOMMENDED HYPOPNEA (SECONDS)

variable.name: supinep5
variable.description: CALCULATED - PCT TIME SUPINE

variable.name: nsupinep5
variable.description: CALCULATED - PCT TIME NON-SUPINE

variable.name: rdi3ps5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL SUPINE RDI AT 3% DESAT

variable.name: rdi3pns5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL NON-SUPINE RDI AT 3% DESAT

variable.name: rdi4p5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL RDI AT 4% DESAT

variable.name: rdi4ps5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL SUPINE RDI AT 4% DESAT

variable.name: rdi4pns5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL NON-SUPINE RDI AT 4% DESAT

variable.name: rdirem4p5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL REM RDI AT 4% DESAT

variable.name: rdinr4p5
variable.description: CALCULATED - OVERALL NON-REM RDI AT 4% DESAT

variable.name: sleepy5
variable.description: PAST 4 WEEKS: FEEL OVERLY SLEEPY DURING DAY
variable.value: NO, NOT IN THE PAST 4 WEEKS
YES, LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK
YES, 5 OR MORE TIMES A WEEK

variable.name: readng5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: SITTING AND READING

variable.name: tv5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: WATCHING TV

variable.name: sittng5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: SITTING INACTIVE IN PUBLIC

variable.name: riding5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: RIDING AS PASSENGER IN CAR

variable.name: lyngdwn5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: LYING DOWN TO REST IN AFTERNOON

variable.name: talkng5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: SITTING AND TALKING TO SOMEONE

variable.name: quietly5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: SITTING QUIETLY AFTER LUNCH (NO ALCOHOL)

variable.name: car5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: IN CAR STOPPED IN TRAFFIC

variable.name: dinner5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: AT DINNER TABLE

variable.name: driving5
variable.description: CHANCE OF DOZING / FALL ASLEEP WHILE: WHILE DRIVING

variable.name: snored5
variable.description: PAST 4 WEEKS: SNORED
variable.value: ALWAYS OR ALMOST ALWAYS (6-7 NIGHTS A WEEK)

variable.name: stpbrthng5
variable.description: PAST 4 WEEKS: STOP BREATHING DURING SLEEP
variable.value: ALWAYS OR ALMOST ALWAYS (6-7 NIGHTS A WEEK)
